text: Ibrahima Diallo (born 8 March 1999) is a French professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Premier League club Southampton. ==Professional career== A youth product of the Monaco academy, On 13 August 2018, Diallo joined Stade Brestois 29 on loan. Diallo made his professional debut with Brest in a 1–1 (4–3) penalty shootout win in the Coupe de la Ligue over Sochaux on 14 August 2018. On 4 October 2020, Diallo signed for Premier League club Southampton on a four-year contract, for an undisclosed fee. ==Personal life== Diallo was born in France and is of Senegalese descent.
